-MTx6jobDzTjxe3udc70.ans_1: Won money in a lottery and purchased his freedom
-MTx6jobDzTjxe3udc70.ans_2: He ran away and made it to the North
-MTx6jobDzTjxe3udc70.ans_3: He didn't. He got caught helping others escape.

-MTx6jodNGoWyEe1lr9e.ans_1: Woolworth‟s store in Greensboro, North Carolina

-MTx6jp5RjOwike3P_t6.ans_3: Meriwether Lewis. He took his slave, Charlie.
